## dotToAscii() function

Converts a GraphVix diagram into its ASCII representation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function dotToAscii(dot: string, options?: DotToAsciiOptions): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dot | string | The GraphViz data to convert |
|  options | [DotToAsciiOptions](./dot-to-ascii.dottoasciioptions.md) | Optional configuration to use |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;
